help-file.title: "CONJURE ELEMENTAL"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: One elemental Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Summoning
When cast, "Conjure Elemental" summons an elemental from a random elemental plane which will follow the player as though charmed for a limited period of time. There is no way to control which type of elemental is summoned.
If the elemental is aggressive when the charm wears off, it will attack you and others.
